home.parrafo-info: Systems Engineering student with solid knowledge in programming, I focus more on Web Development. I am ready to contribute in professional environments, applying my knowledge and technical skills to develop projects that provide the best user experience.

sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi:
I am an undergraduate student in Systems Engineering, focused on programming.
I aspire to obtain a job in the development field, gain experience, acquire new knowledge, and strengthen my professional life.

I am an empathetic and enthusiastic person, with skills focused on teamwork, assertive communication, problem-solving, responsibility, and proactivity. I enjoy learning new experiences and constantly improving myself.

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: Design of a project that allows users to log in, create an account, and securely change their password.
proyectos.info-proyecto2: My personal web portfolio, where you can find some of my most outstanding projects, my technical skills and a bit about my background.
